timeline.bodyText: Do we need this dependency? If we do, let's remove the version.
timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+Manifest-Version: 1.0
+Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2
+Bundle-Name: VirSat External Lib - Swagger
+Bundle-SymbolicName: de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib.swagger
+Bundle-Version: 4.12.1.qualifier
+Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.8
+Bundle-Vendor: DLR (German Aerospace Center)
+Require-Bundle: de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib,
+ javax.servlet;visibility:=reexport,
+ de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib.jersey;bundle-version="4.12.1"

replies.bodyText: No we don't, thanks :) This was needed when we had more swagger dependencies, but now we don't need it anymore!
replies.author: JAmmermann-DLR

timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr

replies.bodyText: Forgot to remove the comments, will do it now

Task #808: Test generate REST API documentation with Swagger

timeline.bodyText: We now wrap these into the downloadLibs profile (check other external libs) to prevents maven from downloading these dependencies during build time.
timeline.author: SaMuellerDLR
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+<!-- Copyright (c) 2008-2019 German Aerospace Center (DLR), Simulation and 
+	Software Technology, Germany. This program and the accompanying materials 
+	are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0 which 
+	is available at http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0. SPDX-License-Identifier: 
+	EPL-2.0 -->
+
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+	xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+	<parent>
+		<artifactId>de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib.maven.parent</artifactId>
+		<groupId>de.dlr.sc.virsat</groupId>
+		<version>4.12.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+		<relativePath>../de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib/maven/pom.xml</relativePath>
+	</parent>
+
+	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+	<artifactId>de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib.swagger</artifactId>
+	<name>de.dlr.sc.virsat.external.lib.swagger</name>
+	<packaging>eclipse-plugin</packaging>
+
+	<!-- Execute with profile downloadLib which is defined in the parent pom 
+		to update all libs and licenses from maven -->
+
+	<properties>
+		<swagger.version>1.6.2</swagger.version>
+	</properties>
+
+	<dependencies>

timeline.message:
Wrap swagger dependency in downloadLibs profile - (Task #808)

---
